newsitem.title: FINLAND: P-K KIRJAPAINO SEES WEAKER 1997 EARNINGS.
newsitem.headline: P-K KIRJAPAINO SEES WEAKER 1997 EARNINGS.

text.p: Finnish newspaper and printing group Pohjois-Karjalan Kirjapaino Oy said on Thursday it expected earnings to weaken this year due to scant trading in securities.
"The advertising and subscription revenues of the group's newspapers are likely to remain at the previous year's level," the company said in a statement with its 1996 results.
Net sales and earnings of Pohjois-Karjalan Kirjapaino's printing operations would increase, it said.
"Trading in securities is expected to be scant and because of that the group's earnings are expected to weaken," it said.
